definition: suspense in a movie, play etc/concern for sb's welfare
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

sentences.english: This new mystery show is one of the ten best of the season.
sentences.chinese: 這部新的懸念劇是這個季度十佳電視劇之一。

sentences.english: The result is a story where each answer creates more questions.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，這個故事裏的每個回答都製造出更多的懸念。

sentences.english: This time we think we will end with more a cliffhanger .
sentences.chinese: 而這一次，我認爲我們我們將會以一個懸念結束。

sentences.english: At this point, I'm going to leave you with a bit of a cliffhanger.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我要給您留一點懸念。

sentences.english: The Finnish mobile phone manufacturer Nokia Oyj.
sentences.chinese: 毫無懸念，是芬蘭的移動手機制造商諾基亞。

sentences.english: Technothriller has become popular all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 高科技懸念小說已在全世界受到歡迎。

sentences.english: The tension or suspense is: what will the moral be?
sentences.chinese: 而這個張力和懸念是，那會是個什麼寓意？

sentences.english: The author keeps the reader on tenterhooks till the last chapter.
sentences.chinese: 作者不斷給讀者造成懸念直到讀完最後一章。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, the cheerful bunch wanted to be happy.
sentences.chinese: 毫無懸念，樂呵呵的一夥想要快樂。

sentences.english: Also, I know most of you are not happy about the cliffhanger ending.
sentences.chinese: 我也知道讓這個懸念結束你們都很不開心。

sentences.english: In the 4th minute unfortunately a mistake by Storari re-opened the match.
sentences.chinese: 第4分鐘，卡拉奇的失誤讓比賽再次充滿懸念。

sentences.english: A one-sided gamble of inquiry, the beginner blade doubt to wantonly westerlo.
sentences.chinese: 一邊倒的賭局中，新手刀鋒毫無懸念地大肆敗北。

sentences.english: How do you keep a jackass in suspense?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼讓一頭蠢驢處於懸念中呢？

sentences.english: Let’s face it, flesh-and-blood human beings are not built to undergo this level of suspense.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在面對人類的血肉之軀無法承受的懸念。

sentences.english: The book contains a lot of classic suspensive short stories.
sentences.chinese: 那本書裏包含了很多經典的短篇懸念故事。

definition: victory or defeat/the outcome of a battle
to leave a place where some event is taking place/(of an actor) to exit/(sports) to leave the field/(of an audience) to leave
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
